mapper.select:
select t2.* from ( select t1.* ,rank() over (partition by s_path order by cnt desc, s_no, a_no ) chart from (select a_cover, s_no, a_no, s_name, s_path, a_name, count(*) cnt from sound join album using(a_no)
join (select a_no, s_no from sound_like) using (a_no, s_no) group by a_cover, s_no, a_no, s_name, a_name,s_path order by cnt) t1
join (select p_no, a_no, s_no, p_date from playinfo) using (a_no, s_no)
where p_date <= (select last_day(sysdate) from dual) and p_date > (select add_months((select last_day(sysdate) from dual),-1) from dual)
where p_date >= (SELECT trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') FROM dual)
where p_date = sysdate
group by a_cover, s_no, a_no, s_name,a_name,s_path, p_date order by cnt) t1
) t2 where chart <= #{limit}

select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}
